member.name: T:FlexServerSDK.Authentication.BaseCyberSourceGateKeeperCredentials
member.summary: Provides shared authentication functionality between CGK and Flex API credentials.

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.Authentication.BaseCyberSourceGateKeeperCredentials.Environment
member.summary: Gets the environment against which the credentials are to be used.

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.Authentication.BaseCyberSourceGateKeeperCredentials.Mid
member.summary: Gets the CyberSource merchant ID.

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.Authentication.BaseCyberSourceGateKeeperCredentials.KeyId
member.summary: Gets the ID of the authentication key.

member.name: M:FlexServerSDK.Authentication.BaseCyberSourceGateKeeperCredentials.SetEnvironment(FlexServerSDK.Authentication.Environment)
member.summary: Sets the environment against which the credentials are to be used.
member.returns: this instance to facilitate fluent API usage

member.name: M:FlexServerSDK.Authentication.BaseCyberSourceGateKeeperCredentials.SetEnvironment(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the environment against which the credentials are to be used.
member.returns: this instance to facilitate fluent API usage

member.name: M:FlexServerSDK.Authentication.BaseCyberSourceGateKeeperCredentials.SetMid(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the CyberSource merchant ID.
member.returns: this instance to facilitate fluent API usage

member.name: M:FlexServerSDK.Authentication.BaseCyberSourceGateKeeperCredentials.SetKeyId(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the ID of the authentication key.
member.returns: this instance to facilitate fluent API usage

member.name: M:FlexServerSDK.Authentication.BaseCyberSourceGateKeeperCredentials.SetSharedSecret(System.Security.SecureString)
member.summary: Sets the sensitive authentication shared secret.
member.returns: this instance to facilitate fluent API usage
member.remarks: The shared secret is stored as a SecureString and its decrypted value securely overwritten after use to help protect against its exposure through heap inspection. Similar care should be taken by the merchant to protect sensitive Flex authentication credentials.

member.name: T:FlexServerSDK.Authentication.CyberSourceFlexCredentials
member.summary: Authentication credentials for CyberSource Flex API.

member.name: M:FlexServerSDK.Authentication.CyberSourceFlexCredentials.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor. Use it when you want to call setters individually. Note that you can use fluent API in such case.

member.name: M:FlexServerSDK.Authentication.CyberSourceFlexCredentials.#ctor(FlexServerSDK.Authentication.Environment,System.String,System.String,System.Security.SecureString)
member.summary: Constructor that can be used to supply all authentication information in one call. Successfully invoked constructor produces an object that is ready for use with .
member.param: The environment against which the credentials are to be used
The ID of the authentication key

member.name: T:FlexServerSDK.Authentication.Environment
member.summary: The available Flex API environments against which the SDK may be used.

member.name: F:FlexServerSDK.Authentication.Environment.TEST
member.summary: Denotes merchant facing test environment. Test environment is called "sandbox" for Visa Developer Platform and "CAS" for CyberSource Developer Platform.

member.name: F:FlexServerSDK.Authentication.Environment.LIVE
member.summary: Denotes production environment.

member.name: T:FlexServerSDK.Exception.FlexApiClientException

member.summary: Constructs a new instance of the exception with the specified error response.

member.summary: The "v-c-correlation-id" returned by Flex API.

The exception that is the cause of the current exception

member.name: T:FlexServerSDK.Exception.FlexSDKInternalException
member.summary: Exception that is thrown when there is an error performing an internal SDK function.

member.name: T:FlexServerSDK.Exception.FlexSecurityException

The exception that is the cause of the current exception

member.summary: Default configuration

member.summary: Default configuration with debug logging enabled

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.FlexServiceConfiguration.RequestTimeout
member.summary: Gets or set the number of milliseconds after which the Flex API HTTP request will time out.

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.FlexServiceConfiguration.Proxy
member.summary: Gets or sets the proxy to use to connect to Flex API.

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.FlexServiceConfiguration.EnableDebugLogging

member.remarks: By default there is no proxy used.

member.returns: this instance

member.name: T:FlexServerSDK.IFlexService
member.summary: This service exposes the Flex Server SDK functions.

member.name: M:FlexServerSDK.IFlexService.CreateKey
member.summary: Generates a Flex API limited time use public RSA key. The encryption type defaults to .
member.returns: The Flex API public RSA key

member.name: M:FlexServerSDK.IFlexService.CreateKey(FlexServerSDK.Model.KeysRequestParameters)
member.summary: Generates a Flex API limited time use public RSA key with the supplied parameters.
member.param: The parameters with which the key is to be generated
member.returns: The Flex API public RSA key

member.name: M:FlexServerSDK.IFlexService.CreateKey(FlexServerSDK.Model.EncryptionType)
member.summary: Generates a Flex API limited time use public RSA key with the supplied encryption type.
member.param: The encryption type to be used with the key
member.returns: The Flex API public RSA key

member.name: M:FlexServerSDK.IFlexService.CreateKey(FlexServerSDK.Model.EncryptionType,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a Flex API limited time use public RSA key with the supplied encryption type for use with Flex Microform.
member.param: The encryption type to be used with the key
The origin of the website in which Flex Microform will be embedded e.g. "https://www.cybersource.com/"
member.returns: The Flex API public RSA key

member.name: M:FlexServerSDK.IFlexService.DecodePublicKey(FlexServerSDK.Model.FlexPublicKey)
member.summary: Extracts the standard parameters for the RSA algorithm from a Flex API public RSA key.
member.param: The Flex API public RSA key
member.returns: The standard parameters for the System.Security.Cryptography.RSA algorithm

member.name: M:FlexServerSDK.IFlexService.Verify(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that the signature returned in the Flex token response is valid.
member.param: The serialized Flex API public RSA key
The serialized Flex API token response
member.returns: Whether the signaure is valid

member.name: M:FlexServerSDK.IFlexService.Verify(FlexServerSDK.Model.FlexPublicKey,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that the signature returned in the Flex token response is valid.
member.param: The Flex API public RSA key
member.returns: Whether the signaure is valid

member.name: M:FlexServerSDK.IFlexService.Verify(FlexServerSDK.Model.FlexPublicKey,FlexServerSDK.Model.FlexToken)
member.summary: Verifies that the signature returned in the Flex token response is valid.
member.param: The Flex API public RSA key
member.returns: Whether the signaure is valid

member.name: M:FlexServerSDK.IFlexService.Verify(FlexServerSDK.Model.FlexPublicKey,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Verifies that the signature returned in the Flex token response is valid.
member.param: The Flex API public RSA key
Map containing the signed Flex API token response fields and signature
member.returns: Whether the signaure is valid

member.summary: Represents the public RSA key in DER format.

member.summary: Gets and sets the public key format.

member.summary: Gets and sets the algorithm with which the key is used.

member.summary: Gets and sets the encoded key specification.

member.summary: Default constructor. Use if you wish to set properties individually.

member.name: M:FlexServerSDK.Model.DerPublicKey.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a DerPublicKey instance with the supplied format, algorithm and encoded key.

member.name: T:FlexServerSDK.Model.EncryptionType
member.summary: The supported encryption methods which may be used with a Flex API public key.

member.name: F:FlexServerSDK.Model.EncryptionType.None
member.summary: No encryption
member.remarks: An RSA public key will still be generated to allow for signature verification.

member.name: F:FlexServerSDK.Model.EncryptionType.RsaOaep
member.summary: RSA with OAEP padding

member.name: F:FlexServerSDK.Model.EncryptionType.RsaOaep256
member.summary: RSA with OAEP padding with SHA-256 hash function
member.remarks: This encryption type is not supported by older versions of Safari.

member.name: T:FlexServerSDK.Model.FlexToken
member.summary: Represents the Flex API token response.

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.Model.FlexToken.keyId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the key associated with the token.

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.Model.FlexToken.token
member.summary: Gets or sets the generated token. The token replaces card data and is used as the Subscription ID in the CyberSource Simple Order API or SCMP API.

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.Model.FlexToken.maskedPan
member.summary: Gets or sets the masked card number.

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.Model.FlexToken.cardType
member.summary: Gets or sets the card type.

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.Model.FlexToken.timestamp
member.summary: Gets or sets the UTC date and time in milliseconds at which the signature was generated.

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.Model.FlexToken.discoverableServices
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of follow-on services with which the token may be used.

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.Model.FlexToken.signedFields
member.summary: Gets or sets which fields from the response make up the data that is used when verifying the response signature.

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.Model.FlexToken.signature
member.summary: Gets or sets the Flex-generated digital signature. To ensure the values have not been tampered with while passing through the client, verify the signature server-side using the associated Flex API public key.

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.Model.FlexToken._embedded
member.summary: Gets or sets the embedded object(s).

member.name: M:FlexServerSDK.Model.FlexToken.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a FlexToken instance.

member.name: T:FlexServerSDK.Model.KeyRequestSettings
member.summary: Represents additional settings which may be specified in a Flex API public key request.

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.Model.KeyRequestSettings.unmaskedLeft
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of unmasked digits to be shown at the beginning of the card number (BIN).

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.Model.KeyRequestSettings.unmaskedRight
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of unmasked digits to be shown at the end of the card number.

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.Model.KeyRequestSettings.enableBillingAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to supply billing details when generating the token.

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.Model.KeyRequestSettings.currency
member.summary: Gets or sets the currency to be used with the token.

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.Model.KeyRequestSettings.enableAutoAuth
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to perform an automatic pre-authorisation before generating the token.

member.summary: Represents the Flex API public key request.

member.summary: Gets or sets the encryption type to be used with the key.

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.Model.KeysRequestParameters.targetOrigin
member.summary: Gets or sets the target origin.
member.remarks: This parameter is required if the key is to be used with Flex Microform and must be set to the website in which Flex Microform will be embedded.

member.name: P:FlexServerSDK.Model.KeysRequestParameters.settings
member.summary: Gets or sets additional Flex API public key settings.
